---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
meteorites <- read_csv("data/meteorites_landings_clean.csv")
```


```{r}
meteorites %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x = fall)+
  geom_bar()
```
```{r}
meteorites %>% 
  ggplot()+
  aes(x = year, fill = fall)+
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 100, position=position_dodge())
```
